name: Detached (itch) (Gabbinetto)
description:
Here is my entry for the Wowie Jam 4. This was my first game jam and I'm proud I was able to submit in time. I'm kinda disappointed because there's much more I would have done if I had time (Like adding mudic, more complex puzzles or more puzzle elements) but overall I'm satisfied. Jams are all about learning and having fun, and I definitely learnt a lot from this and had TONS of fun. This is also my first public game, that's pretty cool! Maybe I'll polish this after the jam end.

The game is about collaborating with your body's A.I. because when your head is attached to your body you can't jump. When you detach your head from your body, your body will move on it's own, but it will be able to jump on your command. By making your body interact with the enviroment you can complete up to 8 levels filled with puzzles!

The game is open source, but the project is a big mess. I warned you.

Commands:

  • AD: Move left or right;
  • W: Make your body jump;
  • F: Interact with objects in the level;
  • C: Make your body come back to you;
  • R: Restart level
  • Space: Detach your head;
